description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国音乐家、歌唱家、声乐教育家，满族人，曾任中国音乐学院院长、中国音乐家协会副主席等职务。
description.en: A Chinese musician, singer, and vocal educator of Manchu ethnicity. He served as the President of the China Conservatory of Music and Vice Chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国歌唱家，金铁霖的学生及前妻。
description.en: Chinese singer, a student and former wife of Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖与马秋华的儿子。
description.en: Son of Jin Tielin and Ma Qiuhua.

description.zh-cn: 男高音歌唱家、声乐教育家，金铁霖在中央音乐学院的老师。
description.en: A tenor singer and vocal educator, who was Jin Tielin's teacher at the Central Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐家，曾邀请金铁霖到中国音乐学院任教。
description.en: Chinese musician who invited Jin Tielin to teach at the China Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 中国歌唱家，金铁霖的学生，也是中国培养的第一位民族声乐硕士研究生。
description.en: Chinese singer, a student of Jin Tielin, and the first person in China to receive a master's degree in ethnic vocal music.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌星，曾拜金铁霖为师。
description.en: Hong Kong singer who studied under Jin Tielin.

nodes.id: 北京市文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 北京市文学艺术界联合会
en: Beijing Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 由金铁霖创立或以其名字总结的民族声乐教学方法和理论体系。
description.en: A teaching method and theoretical system for ethnic vocal music founded by or summarized under the name of Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖出生于当时的滨江省哈尔滨市。
description.en: Jin Tielin was born in Harbin, then part of Binjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 1960年考入中央音乐学院声乐系。
description.en: Enrolled in the Vocal Music Department of the Central Conservatory of Music in 1960.

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖在中央音乐学院师从男高音歌唱家、声乐教育家沈湘。
description.en: At the Central Conservatory of Music, Jin Tielin studied under the tenor singer and vocal educator Shen Xiang.

position.zh-cn: 男高音独唱演员、四重唱演员、合唱队男高音声部长
position.en: Tenor soloist, quartet singer, and tenor section leader of the choir

description.zh-cn: 毕业后被分配到中央乐团工作，直至1981年。
description.en: After graduation, he was assigned to work at the Central Philharmonic Orchestra until 1981.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，金铁霖受李凌之邀，到中国音乐学院任教，开启了其声乐教育生涯。
description.en: In 1981, at the invitation of Li Ling, Jin Tielin began teaching at the China Conservatory of Music, starting his career in vocal education.

description.zh-cn: 自1981年起在中国音乐学院任教，并于1996年至2009年间担任院长。
description.en: He taught at the China Conservatory of Music from 1981 and served as its president from 1996 to 2009.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: Served as Vice Chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

relationships.target: 北京市文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 曾任北京市文联主席。
description.en: Served as Chairman of the Beijing Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖创立的民族声乐教学体系被称为“金氏唱法”。
description.en: The ethnic vocal music teaching system founded by Jin Tielin is known as "Jin's Vocal Method".

description.zh-cn: 金铁霖曾与李谷一结婚，后离婚。
description.en: Jin Tielin was once married to Li Guyi, they later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 1990年与马秋华结婚。
description.en: Married Ma Qiuhua in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 金圣权是金铁霖的儿子，于1993年出生。
description.en: Jin Shengquan is the son of Jin Tielin, born in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 金圣权是马秋华的儿子，于1993年出生。
description.en: Jin Shengquan is the son of Ma Qiuhua, born in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛师从金铁霖，并成为中国第一位民族声乐硕士。
description.en: Peng Liyuan studied under Jin Tielin and became China's first master of ethnic vocal music.

description.zh-cn: 李谷一是金铁霖的学生之一。
description.en: Li Guyi was one of Jin Tielin's students.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌星黎明曾拜金铁霖为师。
description.en: Hong Kong singer Leon Lai studied under Jin Tielin.
